Interface

Public Members
ECHO_SXF_Error(SXF_OStream& out, const char* type)

Description

The Error class implements an echo writer of the wrong element type.

Member Description

Constructor.

int openObject(const char* name, const char* type)

Print an error message and return SXF_FALSE.
